Name: Gl'amour Cocktail
Ingredients: 30 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine into chilled glass.
Review: Berry richness fortified with cognac and balanced with lemon juice. A dash of sugar adds richness while egg white smooths.
Nutrition: One serving of Gl'amour Cocktail contains 241 calories
Garnish: Edible flower or dried rose petals
